select c.channel_name, oa.app_name, od.* from t_open_device od join t_open_app oa on oa.app_id=od.app_id join t_channel c on c.channel_id=oa.channel_id where 1=1 and od.`status`=true and oa.`status`=true and c.`status`=true
and od.app_id=#{appId}
and oa.channel_id=#{channelId}
and od.enable=${enable}
and od.device_id like CONCAT('%',#{deviceId},'%')
and od.mac like CONCAT('%',#{mac},'%')
and od.sn like CONCAT('%',#{sn},'%')
and DATE_FORMAT(od.create_time,'%Y%m%d')>=DATE_FORMAT(#{startTime},'%Y%m%d')
and DATE_FORMAT(od.create_time,'%Y%m%d')<=DATE_FORMAT(#{endTime},'%Y%m%d')
and od.remark like CONCAT('%',#{remark},'%')
order by od.create_time desc
